name: Foxy Tales
description:
Get to know all the foxes, because each of them deserves attention. Dreamy, aggressive, funny, sweet - you will find a fox you like!

Easy win: Keyboard Сtrl+D - Complete Level


In the game, your goal is to collect the puzzle in order to restore the pictures. (◕‿◕)♡

Special Features

  • 🦊 Live2D dynamic character
  • 🦊 CG Gallery Mode
  • 🦊 Well-drawn CGs
  • 🦊 Relaxing music
  • 🦊 Puzzle game
